Articles.Content:
spent quite awhile editing this cinematic. Tell me what you think ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/9Zvv5ZVQc0w?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>
Very nice. Would have enjoyed at least short clips of the other bodies though.

> 
> Very nice. Would have enjoyed at least short clips of the other bodies though.

Yeah :/ i was going to add dres and eeloo and some of the moons in there but the video would have been a little to long, might make another video where i show off the moons. Thanks for the feedback! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
This is amazing. I mean, you need rep right now.

> 
> This is amazing. I mean, you need rep right now.

Thank you so much man, means alot<3

> 
> dres

:|

I forgot about Dres again. ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

> 
> :|
> I forgot about Dres again. ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

everyone does :'(
